word:
Chapter 21 

     18-20 (Mark 11:12-14). Fruit-bearing Branches.--The Lord was hungry. He 
                                                                           1097
represented a people hungering for fruit that they ought to have had, but did not receive from an apparently flourishing fig tree. The spiritual necessities were not supplied to satisfy the people whom Christ had pledged His life to save by His grace and righteousness.
